item.description:
Whether you're recovering from yet another Monday at the office, your first Ski Fitness Training of the season, or both, come recover and relax with some food and frosty beverages while watching the Pats Season Opener with the Wedeln crowd!

 

We'll head over to Watch City Brewery when we're done with training, arriving between 7:30 and 7:45.  No need to look fancy or pretty, most of us surely won't!  Come on out even if you can't make the training...you can mock us for being in pain when you're not (but be prepared, our beer will taste WAY better than yours!).  :)

 

Go Pats!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be the sweaty bunch in workout clothes
item.name: Happy, or shall we say Recovery, Hour---Catch the Pats too!
